Name: Landmarks, Willoughby Hart Historic District, Brooklyn (N 250006 HKK).
Title: Application number N 250006 HKK (Willoughby Hart Historic District) submitted by the Landmarks Preservation Commission, pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter and Section 25-303 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, for the designation of the Willoughby Hart Historic District (DL-542/LP-2683), consisting of 33 properties located on Willoughby Avenue and Hart Street between Marcy Avenue and Nostrand Avenue in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 3, Council District 36.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
